sect2.title: 内容
sect2.para: Mutt 包括 mutt, flea, muttbug, mutt_dotlock, pgpwrap 和 pgpring.

sect3.title: mutt
sect3.para: mutt is a Mail User Agent (MUA) which enables you to read, write and delete your email.

sect3.title: flea
sect3.para: flea is a bug submitter for Mutt.

sect3.title: muttbug
sect3.para: muttbug is a script that executes flea.

sect3.title: mutt_dotlock
sect3.para: mutt_dotlock implements the mail spool file lock.
